Posts.Content: Jul 29, 2011 11:44PM oldtimer35 wrote: Excuse me for butting in, but I have to do the research for my daughter, who is 38 and was diagnosed in Feb.  She has had all her rounds of chemo, ending up with Taxol every week for 12 weeks, last one two weeks ago.  She has terrible water retention and her Doc has her on Lasix @ 20mg every day, but just doesn't seem to be doing any good.  She is short, like her mom, and usually weighs about 120, but she now looks like she is 9 months pregnant. She is scheduled for a DMX on Aug 9 and just feels miserable.  Her doc said they were doing all they could with the retention.  Anyone have this problem?
Posts.Title: Anyone have to be on a Diuretic? Tiger_Blood dlb823
